title: #FileSystem.FileSystem

enumLongDescriptions.ASCII: This value shall indicate that the ASCII character encoding is supported by the file system.
enumLongDescriptions.Unicode: This value shall indicate that Unicode characer encoding is supported by the file system.
enumLongDescriptions.ISO2022: This value shall indicate that ISO-2022 character encoding is supported by the file system.
enumLongDescriptions.ISO8859_1: This value shall indicate that ISO-8859-1 character encoding is supported by the file system.
enumLongDescriptions.ExtendedUNIXCode: This value shall indicate that Extended Unix Code character encoding is supported by the file system.
enumLongDescriptions.UTF_8: This value shall indicate that the UTF-8 character encoding is supported by the file system.
enumLongDescriptions.UTF_16: This value shall indicate that the UTF-16 character encoding is supported by the file system.
enumLongDescriptions.UCS_2: This value shall indicate that the UCS-2 character encoding is supported by the file system.

CharacterCodeSet.description: Supported character code standards for different alphabets and languages.
CharacterCodeSet.longDescription: The values shall indicate the character code standards supported by the file system.

enumLongDescriptions.NFSv3: This value shall indicate that NFSv3, as defined in RFC 1813, is supported by the file system.
enumLongDescriptions.NFSv4_0: This value shall indicate that NFSv4, as defined in RFC 7530, is supported by the file system.
enumLongDescriptions.NFSv4_1: This value shall indicate that NFSv4.1, as defined in RFC 5661, is supported by the file system.
enumLongDescriptions.SMBv2_0: This value shall indicate that Server Message Block version 2.0 is supported by the file system.
enumLongDescriptions.SMBv2_1: This value shall indicate that Server Message Block version 2.1 is supported by the file system.
enumLongDescriptions.SMBv3_0: This value shall indicate that Server Message Block version 3.0 is supported by the file system.
enumLongDescriptions.SMBv3_0_2: This value shall indicate that Server Message Block version 3.0.2 is supported by the file system.
enumLongDescriptions.SMBv3_1_1: This value shall indicate that Server Message Block version 3.1.1 is supported by the file system.

FileProtocol.description: The file sharing protocols supported by the file system.
FileProtocol.longDescription: The values shall indicate the file sharing protocols supported by the file system. At least one value shall be present.

enumDescriptions.Persistent: The file system is persistent, and will be preserved through an orderly shutdown.
enumDescriptions.Temporary: The file system is not persistent, and may not survive a shutdown.
enumDescriptions.Other: The persistence type is known, but not defined by this standard. Use of this value is not recommended.

enumLongDescriptions.Persistent: This value shall indicate that the file system is persistent, and shall be preserved through an orderly shutdown.
enumLongDescriptions.Temporary: This value shall indicate that the file system is non-persistent and may not survive a shutdown.
enumLongDescriptions.Other: This value shall indicate that the persistence type is known, but not defined by this standard. Use of this value is not recommended.

FileSystemPersistenceType.description: The persistence characteristics of the file system.
FileSystemPersistenceType.longDescription: The value shall indicate the persistence characteristics of the file system.
